short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We deliver your orders from anywhere to your doorstep

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pick 'N' Pay Extension helps you place your international orders on our system: We deliver to the nearest pickup station near you. No need to go through customs . LocQar has it covered.
